name: Super Satie Kart Vexations!
description:
In 1893, Erik Satie wrote a piece of music like no other - Vexations - a piece so daunting that it would not be performed until 70 years after its creation. Since 1963, pianists have been driven to madness by its fearful repetition, atonality, and world-length duration. Audiences have been driven to irritation, refunds, and away from classical music forever.

Now you can experience it the least authentic way possible - as a kart-racing game!
